thread.title: Gorgeous 'Belle' clip from 'Beauty and the Beast' leaves us wanting more
thread.title_full: Gorgeous 'Belle' clip from 'Beauty and the Beast' leaves us wanting more

author: Proma Khosla
title: Gorgeous 'Belle' clip from 'Beauty and the Beast' leaves us wanting more
text:
Bonjour! Welcome to Disney's live-action Beauty and the Beast , where everything is live-action but also takes you back to your childhood and nothing hurts. A new clip from the film shows Emma Watson in full Belle glory, a "peculiar" girl in a simple town where no one can help but sing about it.
SEE ALSO: 'Beauty and the Beast' mashed up with 'Harry Potter' makes a bizarre love story
The full song will eventually introduce Gaston (Luke Evans) and Le Fou (Josh Gad), but this teaser is true to its name and cuts off with less than a minute of Belle and the townsfolk. We establish that Belle is a weirdo who likes to read (her material of choice may elicit more than one thinkpiece) and is kind but doesn't quite fit in.
Beauty and the Beast hits theaters March 17.
